item.title: Motion Count Down 1.1
item.description: Name : Motion Count Down Version : 1.1 Type : Customize Plugin Price : $67 Homepage : SalePage This is a slick & powerful WordPress Plugin allowing you to create beautiful Countdown Timers INSIDE Your Emails. It's already proven (that's why we all do it) how powerful timers are on your Website to massively increase your conversions & sales BUT the problem is to get people from your email to your Sales Page in the first place. This is where 'Motion Countdown' comes in - Now you & your subscribers can Easily & Quickly create beautiful scarcity timers INSIDE your emails in no time, boosting your clicks & sales right away. This will increase your conversions, your sales and also your Click-Through-Rate inside your emails because now the moment someone opens your email they immediately see the timer ticking to zero, urging them to take action right away. This is perfect for ANYONE with an email list or who aspires to have an email list. Use it for Product Launches, Webinar Promotions, Promoting Someone Else's Launch, Holiday Specials - doesn't matter what the offer is or who the promoter is (Affiliates, CPA Marketers, Local Marketers, Small Businesses, Tee Spring etc.) if there is an offer that expires, it needs 'Motion Countdown' to make more sales and to add massive Scarcity, Period.
